text: Mbe mba nzambarir Zisas ga mbuav kim, mbarkɨrga 1,000 gumgi gu mbigi, mbe siav Zisas ga suav, ana phok thɨgi. Mba gumgi gu mbigi guigira vhɨrkɨvgiap, mbe warira thiphogi. Mba gumgi gu mbigi guigira vhɨrkɨvgim, Zisas fharav kha kamen wo phorga rui gumgi ga nzuav, Zisas bigɨna mueŋ vhunama sav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde tuituigira mba Fherasiŋ isa gangiri. Gu tuituigi ganɨnga ne nzuai ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Gu is guara nzuai fhuvara, gu mba mbe nde guiguigi tɨvi ga nzuai.
